dcterms:creator: D. C. Castro
J. Tan
B. Kainz
E. Konukoglu
B. Glocker
dcterms:description: A modified version of MNIST that includes three variables: two continuous scalars (thickness and intensity) and an MNIST image of a handwritten digit, used to showcase deep backtracking counterfactuals.
dcterms:title: Morpho-MNIST

dcterms:creator: Z. Liu
P. Luo
X. Wang
X. Tang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing celebrity images annotated with binary attributes such as age, gender, beard, and baldness, used for generating counterfactuals.
dcterms:title: CelebA
